ack.title: Competing interests
ack.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.title: Authors’ contributions
sec.p: EV and PE conceived the study. EV, LQ, and PE wrote the manuscript. AJ, BLD, EV, GB, LQ, PE, and SA designed the model, simulation scenarios, and comparison with data. LQ and SA developed the model. EV, GB, LQ, PE, and SA designed the computational and statistical analyses. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: The Groupement de Défense Sanitaire de Bretagne (GDS Bretagne) and the DGAl directory of the French Ministry of Agriculture are thanked for providing the individual animal life trajectory data used in this work.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The dataset used as input data for the regional model and thus supporting the conclusions of this article is the private property of farmers located in Brittany. It was made available for research purpose thanks to GDS Bretagne and the DGAl. It cannot be made publicly available. The code of the model, developed in Cpp, is available on request.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported by the French Research Agency (ANR), program investments for the future, project ANR-10-BINF-07 (MIHMES), and project ANR-16-CE32-0007-01 (CADENCE), the European fund for the regional development of Pays de la Loire (FEDER), the European fund for inventive researcher (Agreenskills plus), and INRA. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analyses, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.

sec.title: Publisher’s Note
sec.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
